title: ok so name and shame exists but......
body: what about name and fame you know when someone does so well that you have to talk about it can we do that?

replies.body: Sure. You're more than welcome to name someone if you intend to speak positively about them.

> [{quoted}](name=Final Spark Lux,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uipa0bd6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-16T07:53:23.989+0000)
>
> Sure. You're more than welcome to name someone if you intend to speak positively about them.

haha can only talk positive things otherwise you get censored i wonder who does that xd definitely not dictators :D
There's a dif between riot being dictators and you, by your own free will, agreeing to the rules they set and responding accordingly.
TBH, I haven't read them in a long while. I did eight years ago when I heard there was a unique punishment for League. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

You dont even have to read them, just use common knowledge.

Being mean to people is a no no
alright then im op here making me the dictator back the hell off plz
